img-table-lamp-die.description: Table lamp (die Lampe) - Modern white table lamp with cylindrical shade, turned on and glowing, shown on a simple surface against neutral background.

img-sofacouch-das-sofa.description: Sofa/couch (das Sofa) - Comfortable gray modern sofa with cushions, 2-3 seater, shown from front angle displaying its full length and comfortable appearance.

img-visual-representation-colors.description: Visual representation of colors: Display of colorful objects or color swatches showing red (rot), blue (blau), green (grün), yellow (gelb), black (schwarz), white (weiß), brown (braun), orange, purple (lila), and gray (grau). Can be paint swatches, colored pencils, or simple geometric shapes in these colors.

specs.style: educational, clear color representation, bright and vibrant

img-ikea-store-exterior.description: IKEA store exterior or interior shopping scene - German customers browsing furniture in a modern furniture warehouse. Shopping carts with flat-pack boxes visible. Blue and yellow IKEA branding recognizable.

vid-furniture-store-scene.description: Furniture store scene: Female salesperson greets male customer. Dialog: 'Guten Tag! Kann ich Ihnen helfen?' - 'Ja, ich suche einen Tisch. Wie viel kostet der Tisch dort?' - 'Der Tisch kostet 199 Euro. Er ist sehr schön, oder?' - 'Ja, er ist schön. Und die Lampe? Was kostet sie?' - 'Die Lampe kostet 45 Euro.' Customer examines furniture while speaking, salesperson is friendly and helpful.

specs.audio: Clear German pronunciation, polite professional tone

usedIn.context: Complete dialog demonstrating shopping for furniture, using der/die/das articles, and asking prices

img-person-pajamas-walking.description: Person in pajamas walking toward bed with bedside lamp on, ready to sleep. Nighttime scene showing person preparing to go to bed. Clock showing 10:00 PM visible.

img-visual-diagram-showing.description: Visual diagram showing separable verb 'aufstehen' - split view showing the verb separation. Left side: 'aufstehen' together, right side: sentence structure showing 'Ich stehe ... auf' with arrow showing 'auf' moving to end of sentence.

specs.style: educational diagram, clear arrows and text, simple and instructive

usedIn.context: Grammar tip: Separable verbs (Trennbare Verben) - how prefix separates in sentences

img-clock-faces-showing.description: Clock faces showing different times: Full hour (7:00 'sieben Uhr'), half hour (6:30 'halb sieben'), quarter past (6:15 'Viertel nach sechs'), quarter to (6:45 'Viertel vor sieben'). Clear analog clock faces with German time expressions labeled.

specs.style: educational, clear clock faces, labeled with German expressions

usedIn.context: Grammar tip: Telling time in German - including the tricky 'halb' concept

img-person-getting-dressed.description: Person getting dressed, pulling shirt over head or buttoning shirt. Morning routine scene, showing the action of putting on clothes.

specs.style: natural morning routine, bedroom or dressing area, relatable daily action

usedIn.context: Vocabulary: 'sich anziehen' (to get dressed) - reflexive separable verb

img-german-breakfast-table.description: German breakfast table scene showing typical German morning routine - Brötchen (breakfast rolls) in a basket, someone eating early at 6-7 AM (clock visible), organized and punctual atmosphere.

specs.style: realistic German lifestyle, cultural context, morning atmosphere

usedIn.context: Cultural note: Daily routine in Germany - Germans wake early, have Brötchen breakfast, eat dinner early around 6-7 PM

vid-two-colleagues-meeting.description: Two colleagues meeting in office break room. Dialog: 'Wann stehst du morgens auf?' - 'Ich stehe um sieben Uhr auf. Und du?' - 'Ich stehe um halb sieben auf. Dann frühstücke ich.' - 'Wann gehst du zur Arbeit?' - 'Um acht. Und abends gehe ich um zehn ins Bett.' Natural conversation with friendly expressions and gestures.

img-educational-diagram-showing.description: Educational diagram showing reflexive pronouns with different subjects: 'ich → mich', 'du → dich', 'er/sie/es → sich', 'wir → uns', 'ihr → euch', 'sie/Sie → sich'. Clear table format with example 'Ich wasche mich' showing pronoun usage.

specs.style: educational diagram, clear typography, instructional design

usedIn.context: Grammar tip: Reflexive verbs and pronouns (Reflexive Verben)

img-split-diagram-showing.description: Split diagram showing Akkusativ vs Dativ reflexive pronouns: Left side shows 'Ich wasche mich' (whole body), right side shows 'Ich wasche mir die Hände' (specific body part). Visual highlighting of 'mich' vs 'mir' difference.

specs.style: educational comparison diagram, clear visual distinction, instructional

usedIn.context: Grammar tip: Reflexive pronouns with Dativ when body parts are mentioned

vid-mother-and-teenage.description: Mother and teenage son (Max) morning bathroom routine scene. Mother outside bathroom calling: 'Max, steh auf! Du siehst aus wie ein Vogelnest!' - Max (with messy hair, comedic): 'Okay, okay. Ich bürste mir die Haare.' Show typical rushed morning family scenario with humor.

vid-cafe-scene-gast.description: Cafe scene. Gast: 'Entschuldigung, kann ich bestellen?' Kellner: 'Gern! Was darf es sein?' Gast: 'Ich hätte gern einen Kaffee und ein Stück Kuchen.' Kellner: 'Mit Milch und Zucker?' Gast: 'Ja, bitte. Und die Rechnung, bitte!'

vid-supermarket-scene-sara.description: Supermarket scene. Sara: 'Ich muss einkaufen gehen. Kommst du mit?' Ali: 'Ja, gern! Was isst du gern?' Sara: 'Ich esse gern Obst und Gemüse. Ich esse kein Fleisch.' Ali: 'Bist du Vegetarierin?' Sara: 'Ja, genau! Ich esse auch keine Milchprodukte.'

img-german-bank-building.description: German bank building exterior. Modern glass facade with bank logo. Professional architecture typical of German banking institutions. ATM machines visible outside.

specs.style: modern German bank building, professional, urban setting

img-modern-german-hospital.description: Modern German hospital (Krankenhaus) building. Large medical facility with emergency entrance marked 'Notaufnahme'. Red cross or similar medical symbols. Clean, modern architecture.

specs.style: modern hospital, medical facility, professional German healthcare

img-traditional-german-marktplatz.description: Traditional German Marktplatz (market square) with historic town hall or church in background. Market stalls with fresh produce, flowers. People shopping. Cobblestone square.

specs.style: traditional German market square, colorful market stalls, historic buildings

img-german-museum-exterior.description: German museum exterior. Classical architecture with columns, or modern museum building. Sign showing 'Museum'. Visitors entering. Cultural institution appearance.

specs.style: German museum building, cultural institution, professional

img-german-post-office.description: German post office (Die Post) exterior. Yellow Deutsche Post logo prominent. Modern service center. Post boxes visible outside.

specs.style: Deutsche Post branding, modern service center, yellow logo

img-german-supermarket-supermarkt.description: German supermarket (Supermarkt) exterior. Popular chain like REWE, EDEKA, or Aldi. Shopping carts visible. Modern retail building. Customers entering with shopping bags.

specs.style: modern German supermarket, recognizable chain, retail setting

img-traditional-german-rathaus.description: Traditional German Rathaus (city hall/town hall). Historic building with clock tower, located at market square. German and EU flags. Official government building architecture.

specs.style: historic German town hall, traditional architecture, official building

img-collage-showing-typical.description: Collage showing typical German city features: Altstadt (old town) with historic half-timbered buildings, bicycle lanes with cyclists, closed shops on Sunday with 'Geschlossen' signs, and the red pharmacy 'A' sign.

specs.style: educational collage, German city life, cultural elements

usedIn.context: Cultural note: Characteristics of German cities

vid-mina-and-thomas.description: Mina and Thomas having a conversation on a Berlin street. Mina: 'Hallo! Ich bin neu in Berlin. Kennst du die Stadt?' Thomas: 'Ja, sehr gut! Was suchst du?' Mina: 'Ich brauche eine Apotheke und eine Bank.' Thomas: 'Es gibt eine Apotheke in der Hauptstraße. Die Bank ist am Marktplatz.' Mina: 'Und wo ist der Bahnhof?' Thomas: 'Der Bahnhof ist neben dem Park. Dort gibt es auch ein schönes Café!'

specs.audio: Clear German pronunciation, friendly tone, urban background sounds

usedIn.context: Main dialog demonstrating how to talk about city locations using 'es gibt'

img-tourist-asking-german.description: Tourist asking a German passerby for directions on a city street. Tourist has map or phone. Passerby pointing and gesturing direction. German street signs visible in background.

specs.style: urban German setting, friendly interaction, street signs visible

usedIn.context: Opening dialog: Tourist politely asking for directions to the train station

img-street-view-showing.description: Street view showing person walking straight ahead (geradeaus) on German street. Arrow or overlay indicating straight direction. Clear pedestrian path, German street setting.

specs.style: clear directional image, German urban street, educational

img-person-cyclist-turning.description: Person or cyclist turning left at a German intersection. Left turn arrow visible. Street corner with clear left direction indicator. German traffic setting.

specs.style: clear left turn demonstration, German street, directional

img-person-vehicle-turning.description: Person or vehicle turning right at a German intersection. Right turn arrow visible. Street corner with clear right direction indicator. German urban setting.

specs.style: clear right turn demonstration, German street, directional

img-german-street-corner.description: German street corner (Ecke). Building corner where two streets meet. Clear corner architecture. Street signs visible showing intersection.

specs.style: urban German street corner, clear architectural corner, realistic

img-german-intersection-kreuzung.description: German intersection (Kreuzung) from above or street level. Four-way crossing with crosswalks. Traffic lights visible. Cars and pedestrians navigating intersection.

specs.style: German urban intersection, clear crossing, traffic organization

img-german-traffic-light.description: German traffic light (Ampel) at pedestrian crossing. Red/yellow/green lights visible. Pedestrian waiting at crossing. Clear view of traffic signal with walking figure symbols.

specs.style: German traffic light, pedestrian crossing, urban safety

img-person-walking-german.description: Person walking on German sidewalk (zu Fuß). Pedestrian zone or walkway. Person in comfortable walking clothes. German city street background.

specs.style: pedestrian friendly German street, walking culture, urban

img-educational-diagram-showing-1.description: Educational diagram showing Imperativ Sie-form directions: arrows labeled 'Gehen Sie geradeaus!', 'Biegen Sie links ab!', 'Biegen Sie rechts ab!' overlaid on simple street map. Clean, instructional design.

specs.style: educational diagram, clear arrows, German text labels, instructional

usedIn.context: Grammar tip: Imperative Sie-form for giving directions

img-collage-showing-german.description: Collage showing German direction-asking culture: person politely saying 'Entschuldigung', Google Maps on phone, clear German street signs with distance markers (200m), and information board at train station.

specs.style: cultural educational collage, modern technology, traditional politeness

usedIn.context: Cultural note: Asking for directions in Germany

vid-tourist-approaches-passerby.description: Tourist approaches passerby on German street. Tourist: 'Entschuldigung! Wo ist der Bahnhof?' Passerby gestures forward: 'Gehen Sie hier geradeaus, etwa 200 Meter.' Tourist: 'Und dann?' Passerby points left: 'Dann biegen Sie links ab. Der Bahnhof ist auf der rechten Seite.' Tourist: 'Ist das weit von hier?' Passerby: 'Nein, nur 5 Minuten zu Fuß.' Tourist: 'Vielen Dank für Ihre Hilfe!'

specs.audio: Clear German pronunciation, polite tone, include hand gestures for directions

usedIn.context: Main dialog demonstrating polite direction asking and imperative forms

vid-mina-asks-man.description: Mina asks a man for directions on a German street. Mina: 'Entschuldigung, wie komme ich zur U-Bahn-Station?' Mann gestures: 'Gehen Sie hier geradeaus bis zur Kreuzung.' Mina: 'Und an der Kreuzung?' Mann points right: 'An der Kreuzung biegen Sie rechts ab. Die Station ist gegenüber der Post.' Mina: 'Vielen Dank!'

specs.audio: Clear German pronunciation, natural pace, helpful tone

usedIn.context: Second dialog example showing directions to U-Bahn station

img-lisa-and-armin.description: Lisa and Armin having a conversation at a German transit station or street. Both in commuter clothing. Transportation options visible in background (bus, bikes, U-Bahn sign).

specs.style: modern German transit setting, commuter culture, urban

usedIn.context: Opening dialog: Lisa and Armin discussing how they commute to work

img-german-u-bahn-subway.description: German U-Bahn (subway) train at platform. Modern yellow Berlin U-Bahn or Hamburg subway. U-Bahn logo visible. Passengers boarding. Clean, modern station.

specs.style: modern German U-Bahn, yellow trains typical of Berlin, clean station

img-german-city-bus.description: German city bus (Bus) at bus stop. Modern public bus with route number. Green/yellow color scheme typical of German buses. Passengers boarding. Clear 'Bus' signage.

specs.style: modern German city bus, public transport, clear signage

img-german-s-bahn-train.description: German S-Bahn train at station platform. Red and cream colored S-Bahn typical of German cities. Large S-Bahn logo visible. Modern commuter train. Deutsche Bahn branding.

specs.style: German S-Bahn, red trains, DB branding, modern commuter rail

img-german-strassenbahn-tram.description: German Straßenbahn (tram) on city street. Modern yellow or red tram with overhead electric wires. Tram tracks visible on street. German urban setting with tram stop.

specs.style: German tram, electric wires overhead, urban street setting, modern design

img-person-riding-bicycle.description: Person riding a bicycle (Fahrrad) on German bicycle lane. Dedicated bike path with bicycle symbol marked on ground. Cyclist in casual or business attire. German city street with bike infrastructure.

specs.style: German bicycle culture, dedicated bike lanes, urban cycling infrastructure

img-german-car-auto.description: German car (Auto) on city street. Modern vehicle, could be popular German brand (VW, BMW, Mercedes). Urban German street setting. Clean, modern automobile.

specs.style: modern German car, urban setting, realistic

img-german-ice-high-speed.description: German ICE high-speed train (Zug) at station platform. Sleek white ICE train with Deutsche Bahn logo. Modern long-distance train. Passengers with luggage.

specs.style: German ICE train, modern high-speed rail, DB branding, professional

img-german-taxi-taxi.description: German taxi at taxi stand. Cream/beige colored taxi with 'TAXI' sign on roof illuminated. Mercedes taxi typical of German cities. Professional taxi service.

specs.style: German taxi, cream colored Mercedes typical, professional service

img-german-airport-flughafen.description: German airport (Flughafen) terminal exterior or interior. Modern airport building with airplane visible. Clear 'Flughafen' signage. Departure boards. Travelers with luggage.

specs.style: modern German airport, clear signage, professional aviation

img-german-bustram-stop.description: German bus/tram stop (Haltestelle) with yellow sign. Information board showing routes and times. Covered waiting area. People waiting. German public transport signage.

specs.style: German transit stop, yellow signage, information boards, modern

img-educational-diagram-showing-2.description: Educational diagram showing 'mit + Dativ' grammar: images of different transport modes with correct article forms. Examples: 'mit dem Bus' (bus icon), 'mit der U-Bahn' (subway icon), 'mit dem Fahrrad' (bike icon). Clean, instructional layout.

specs.style: educational diagram, clear icons, German grammar instruction

usedIn.context: Grammar tip: mit + Dativ for transportation

img-collage-showing-german-1.description: Collage showing German public transport culture: transit ticket/Monatskarte, Deutschland-Ticket (49 Euro), smartphone app showing real-time arrivals, bicycle on S-Bahn, ticket validation machine. Educational cultural overview.

specs.style: cultural educational collage, modern transit culture, German efficiency

usedIn.context: Cultural note: German public transportation system and culture

vid-lisa-and-armin.description: Lisa and Armin at a German transit station. Lisa: 'Wie kommst du jeden Tag zur Arbeit?' Armin: 'Ich fahre mit der U-Bahn. Das geht schnell.' Lisa: 'Ich nehme den Bus. Die Bushaltestelle ist vor meinem Haus.' Armin: 'Fährst du auch mit dem Fahrrad?' Lisa: 'Ja, im Sommer fahre ich oft mit dem Fahrrad.' Armin: 'Am Wochenende fahre ich manchmal mit dem Auto zu meinen Eltern.'

specs.audio: Clear German pronunciation, natural commuter conversation tone

usedIn.context: Main dialog demonstrating transportation vocabulary and mit + Dativ grammar

vid-customer-german-train.description: Customer at German train station information counter. Kunde: 'Entschuldigung, fährt dieser Zug nach Hamburg?' Mitarbeiter: 'Nein, Sie müssen mit der S-Bahn zum Hauptbahnhof fahren.' Kunde: 'Wo ist die S-Bahn-Station?' Mitarbeiter gestures down stairs: 'Gehen Sie die Treppe hinunter. Die Station ist unten.'

specs.audio: Clear German pronunciation, professional service tone, station ambiance

usedIn.context: Dialog showing train station information inquiry

vid-anna-looking-for.description: Anna is looking for her brother at a busy location (like a train station or university campus). She describes him to Max: 'Er hat kurze braune Haare und grüne Augen. Er ist groß und schlank. Er trägt eine schwarze Brille.' Max spots him: 'Ah, da ist er! Der junge Mann mit dem blauen T-Shirt!'

usedIn.context: Dialog demonstrating how to describe people's physical appearance

img-close-up-portrait-showing.description: Close-up portrait showing different hair types: long blonde hair (lange blonde Haare), displayed on a diverse person with clear visibility of hair texture and length.

img-portrait-showing-short.description: Portrait showing short brown hair (kurze braune Haare) on a person with a friendly expression.

img-close-up-eyes-showing.description: Close-up of eyes showing blue eyes (blaue Augen) with clear, vibrant blue color visible.

img-close-up-eyes-showing-1.description: Close-up of eyes showing green eyes (grüne Augen) with clear, vibrant green color visible.

img-color-palette-showing.description: Color palette showing the main colors with labels: schwarz, weiß, rot, blau, grün, gelb, braun, grau, rosa, lila, orange. Each color clearly displayed as a large swatch.

img-full-body-portrait-woman.description: Full-body portrait of a woman with long hair (lange Haare), shown from front view to clearly demonstrate the length.

img-portrait-person-with.description: Portrait of a person with short hair (kurze Haare), clearly showing the short length.

img-full-body-photo-tall.description: Full-body photo of a tall person (groß) standing next to a height reference or doorway, clearly showing their height.

img-full-body-photo-shortsmall.description: Full-body photo of a short/small person (klein) standing next to a height reference, clearly showing their smaller stature.

img-composite-image-showing.description: Composite image showing different body types and hair types: groß/klein (height), schlank/dick (build), blond/dunkel/lockig/glatt (hair types). Each labeled clearly.

img-close-up-person-wearing.description: Close-up of a person wearing glasses (Brille), with focus on the glasses. Person should be smiling and professional-looking.

img-portrait-showing-black-framed.description: Portrait showing black-framed glasses (schwarze Brille) clearly visible on a person's face.

img-portrait-man-with.description: Portrait of a man with a long beard (langer Bart), showing the facial hair clearly.

img-portrait-young-person.description: Portrait of a young person (jung) - someone in their 20s, with youthful, energetic appearance.

img-portrait-older-person.description: Portrait of an older person (alt) - someone in their 70s or 80s, but still active and fit, with gray/white hair.

img-portrait-person-with-1.description: Portrait of a person with curly hair (lockige Haare), showing the curl pattern clearly.

img-portrait-person-with-2.description: Portrait of a person with straight hair (glatte Haare), showing smooth, straight hair texture.

vid-lisa-and-tom.description: Lisa and Tom are in a bookstore or library. Lisa picks up a large, thick book and asks: 'Schau mal! Was ist das?' Tom examines it: 'Das ist ein Buch. Ein großes, dickes Buch.' Lisa: 'Und ist es teuer?' Tom: 'Nein, es ist nicht teuer. Es ist günstig und sehr interessant. Ziemlich schwer! Es ist ein altes Wörterbuch.'

usedIn.context: Dialog demonstrating how to describe objects and their properties

img-large-thick-book.description: A large, thick book (großes, dickes Buch) on a table with clear visibility of its size and thickness.

img-large-round-table.description: A large, round table (großer, runder Tisch) in a room, showing its full size and shape clearly.

img-comparison-image-showing.description: Comparison image showing size contrasts: two books (groß vs. klein), two tables (lang vs. kurz), two items (breit vs. schmal). Side-by-side comparisons with labels.

usedIn.context: Grammar: Size adjectives (groß, klein, lang, kurz, breit, schmal)

img-heavy-package-schweres.description: A heavy package (schweres Paket) being lifted by someone with visible effort, showing the weight.

img-light-bag-leichte.description: A light bag (leichte Tasche) being easily held with one finger or carried effortlessly, showing lightness.

img-expensive-car-teures.description: An expensive car (teures Auto) - luxury vehicle like a Mercedes or BMW with price tag visible or in upscale setting.

img-affordablecheap-phone-guenstiges.description: An affordable/cheap phone (günstiges Handy) with a sale tag or affordable price tag, simple model.

img-opposite-pairs-visual.description: Opposite pairs visual chart: groß↔klein, lang↔kurz, breit↔schmal, schwer↔leicht, teuer↔günstig, neu↔alt, gut↔schlecht. Each pair shown with contrasting images.

img-brand-new-smartphone.description: A brand new smartphone (neues Handy) still in box or with protective film, looking pristine and modern.

img-old-vintage-book.description: An old, vintage book (altes Buch) with worn cover, yellowed pages, looking aged but well-maintained.

img-interesting-book-cover.description: An interesting book cover (interessantes Buch) - showing engaging design, captivating title, colorful and attractive.

img-boring-filmmovie-scene.description: A boring film/movie scene (langweiliger Film) - showing someone yawning while watching TV or looking disinterested.

img-thick-book-dickes.description: A thick book (dickes Buch) shown from the side to emphasize thickness, next to a thin book (dünnes Buch) for comparison.

img-practical-tool-praktisches.description: A practical tool (praktisches Werkzeug) like a Swiss Army knife or multi-tool, showing its usefulness.

img-broken-computer-kaputter.description: A broken computer (kaputter Computer) with cracked screen or error messages visible, clearly not working.

img-clean-roomdesk-sauber.description: A clean room/desk (sauber) with everything organized and tidy, bright and spotless.

img-dirtymessy-room-schmutziges.description: A dirty/messy room (schmutziges Zimmer) with clutter, dust, disorder - clearly contrasting with clean room.

img-beautifulnice-object-schoenes.description: A beautiful/nice object (schönes Ding) - perhaps a modern design object, vase, or decorative item that's aesthetically pleasing.

vid-emma-and-jonas.description: Emma and Jonas meet in the morning. Emma: 'Guten Morgen! Wie ist das Wetter heute?' Jonas looks outside: 'Es ist sonnig und warm. Perfekt für einen Spaziergang!' Emma: 'Super! Aber gestern war es kalt und regnerisch.' Jonas: 'Ja, das Wetter im Herbst ist oft wechselhaft. Und im Winter wird es sehr kalt. Es schneit oft.' Emma: 'Aber der Sommer ist heiß. Dann gehe ich gern schwimmen!'

usedIn.context: Dialog demonstrating how to talk about weather and seasons

img-bright-sunny-day.description: A bright sunny day (sonniger Tag) with clear blue sky, sun visible, perhaps a park or outdoor scene bathed in sunlight.

img-cloudy-day-bewoelkter.description: A cloudy day (bewölkter Tag) with overcast sky, clouds covering the sky, gray but not raining.

img-rain-falling-regnet.description: Rain falling (es regnet) - showing rainfall, raindrops visible, wet streets, people with umbrellas.

img-snow-falling-schneit.description: Snow falling (es schneit) - snowflakes falling from sky, snow-covered ground, winter scene.

img-weather-conditions-composite.description: Weather conditions composite: sunny (sonnig), cloudy (bewölkt), windy (windig), foggy (neblig), stormy (stürmisch) - each shown in separate panel.

img-temperature-visual-hot.description: Temperature visual: hot day (heiß) - thermometer showing high temperature, people in summer clothes, sun blazing.

img-temperature-visual-cold.description: Temperature visual: cold day (kalt) - thermometer showing low temperature, people in winter clothes, cold atmosphere.

img-spring-season-fruehling.description: Spring season (Frühling) - blooming flowers, green grass, trees with fresh leaves, colorful blossoms, mild weather.

img-summer-season-sommer.description: Summer season (Sommer) - bright sun, people at beach or pool, hot weather, blue sky, vacation atmosphere.

img-autumn-season-herbst.description: Autumn season (Herbst) - colorful fall leaves (red, orange, yellow), leaves falling from trees, mild temperatures.

img-winter-season-winter.description: Winter season (Winter) - snow-covered landscape, bare trees, people in heavy coats, cold atmosphere, possibly snowman.

img-four-seasons-comparison.description: Four seasons comparison chart: Frühling (März-Mai), Sommer (Juni-August), Herbst (September-November), Winter (Dezember-Februar) with representative images.

img-happy-person-glueckliche.description: A happy person (glückliche Person) with big genuine smile, joyful expression, bright eyes, positive energy.

img-sad-person-traurige.description: A sad person (traurige Person) with tears or sad expression, downcast eyes, showing sadness or grief.

img-tired-person-muede.description: A tired person (müde Person) yawning, rubbing eyes, looking exhausted, perhaps with coffee.

img-sick-person-kranke.description: A sick person (kranke Person) in bed with thermometer, tissues, looking unwell but cared for.

img-cheerful-person-froehliche.description: A cheerful person (fröhliche Person) laughing, full of energy, joyful expression, lively posture.

img-stressed-person-gestresste.description: A stressed person (gestresste Person im Stress) surrounded by work, looking overwhelmed, tense posture.

img-emotions-chart-showing.description: Emotions chart showing positive emotions (glücklich, fröhlich, zufrieden) and negative emotions (traurig, müde, krank) with facial expressions.

img-windy-day-windiger.description: Windy day (windiger Tag) - trees bending in wind, leaves blowing, person's hair and clothes moving in wind.

img-foggy-day-nebliger.description: Foggy day (nebliger Tag) - limited visibility, fog covering landscape, mysterious atmosphere.

img-stormy-day-stuermischer.description: Stormy day (stürmischer Tag) - dark clouds, lightning if possible, heavy rain, dramatic weather.

img-healthyfit-person-gesundefitte.description: A healthy/fit person (gesunde/fitte Person) exercising or looking vibrant and energetic, showing good health.
